verses.verse: And after <WH310> Abimelech <WH40> there arose <WH6965> to defend <WH3467> Israel <WH3478> Tola <WH8439> the son <WH1121> of Puah <WH6312>, the son <WH1121> of Dodo <WH1734>, a man <WH376> of Issachar <WH3485>; and he lived <WH3427> in Shamir <WH8069> in mountain <WH2022> Ephraim <WH669>.
And he judged <WH8199> Israel <WH3478> twenty <WH6242> and three <WH7969> years <WH8141>, and died <WH4191>, and was buried <WH6912> in Shamir <WH8069>.
And after <WH310> him arose <WH6965> Jair <WH2971>, a Gileadite <WH1569>, and judged <WH8199> Israel <WH3478> twenty <WH6242> and two <WH8147> years <WH8141>.

And he had thirty <WH7970> sons <WH1121> that rode <WH7392> on thirty <WH7970> donkey colts <WH5895>, and they had thirty <WH7970> cities <WH5892>, which are called <WH7121> Havoth <WH2334>â€“jair unto this day <WH3117>, which are in the land <WH776> of Gilead <WH1568>.
And Jair <WH2971> died <WH4191>, and was buried <WH6912> in Camon <WH7056>.

And the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> did <WH6213> evil <WH7451> again <WH3254> in the sight <WH5869> of the Lord <WH3068>, and served <WH5647> Baalim <WH1168>, and Ashtaroth <WH6252>, and the gods <WH430> of Syria <WH758>, and the gods <WH430> of Zidon <WH6721>, and the gods <WH430> of Moab <WH4124>, and the gods <WH430> of the sons <WH1121> of Ammon <WH5983>, and the gods <WH430> of the Philistines <WH6430>, and forsook <WH5800> the Lord <WH3068>, and served not him <WH5647>.

And the anger <WH639> of the Lord <WH3068> was hot <WH2734> against Israel <WH3478>, and he sold <WH4376> them into the hands <WH3027> of the Philistines <WH6430>, and into the hands <WH3027> of the sons <WH1121> of Ammon <WH5983>.

And that year <WH8141> they troubled <WH7492> and oppressed <WH7533> the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>: eighteen <WH8083> years <WH8141>, all the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> that were on the other side <WH5676> Jordan <WH3383> in the land <WH776> of the Amorites <WH567>, which is in Gilead <WH1568>.

Moreover the sons <WH1121> of Ammon <WH5983> passed over <WH5674> Jordan <WH3383> to fight <WH3898> also against Judah <WH3063>, and against Benjamin <WH1144>, and against the house <WH1004> of Ephraim <WH669>; so that Israel <WH3478> was very <WH3966> distressed <WH3334>.

And the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> cried <WH2199> unto the Lord <WH3068>, saying <WH559>, We have sinned <WH2398> against you <WH5800>, both because we have forsaken our God <WH430>, and also served <WH5647> Baalim <WH1168>.

And the Lord <WH3068> said <WH559> unto the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, Did not I deliver you from the Egyptians <WH4714>, and from the Amorites <WH567>, from the sons <WH1121> of Ammon <WH5983>, and from the Philistines <WH6430>?
The Zidonians <WH6722> also <WH6002>, and the Amalekites, and the Maonites <WH4584>, did oppress <WH3905> you <WH6817>; and you cried to me <WH3467>, and I delivered you out of their hand <WH3027>.
Yet you have forsaken <WH5800> me <WH5647>, and served other <WH312> gods <WH430>: why I will deliver <WH3467> you no more <WH3254>.
Go <WH3212> and cry <WH2199> unto the gods <WH430> which you have chosen <WH977>; let them <WH1992> deliver <WH3467> you in the time <WH6256> of your tribulation <WH6869>.

And the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> said <WH559> unto the Lord <WH3068>, We have sinned <WH2398>: do <WH6213> you unto us whatever seems <WH5869> good <WH2896> unto you <WH5337>; deliver us only <WH3117>, we pray you, this day.

And they put away <WH5493> the strange <WH5236> gods <WH430> from among <WH7130> them <WH5647>, and served the Lord <WH3068>: and his soul <WH5315> was grieved <WH7114> for the misery <WH5999> of Israel <WH3478>.

Then the sons <WH1121> of Ammon <WH5983> were gathered together <WH6817>, and encamped <WH2583> in Gilead <WH1568>. And the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> assembled themselves together <WH622>, and encamped <WH2583> in Mizpeh <WH4709>.

And the people <WH5971> and princes <WH8269> of Gilead <WH1568> said <WH559> one <WH376> to another <WH7453>, What man <WH376> is he that will begin <WH2490> to fight <WH3898> against the sons <WH1121> of Ammon <WH5983>? he shall be head <WH7218> over all the inhabitants <WH3427> of Gilead <WH1568>.
